text:
#MustRead. #Covid_19  & growing #inequality. 

The fortunes of the top 1000 billionaires returned to pre-#pandemic levels in just 9 months. 

The 10 richest billionaires made enough money during the pandemic to pay for a #COVID19 #vaccine for all.

https://t.co/oP1baRtwqd @Oxfam https://t.co/BR1dB0dAhn
